column4: how will we know when dapper will be be officiallly released. ops going to make the announcement?
there will be announcements, and fanfare, and sacrifices of virgins, and...
no, dapper is a stable release now, -d is to override the stable check.  -d currently upgrades to edgy.
update manager checks to see if theres stable upgrades, dapper is now fully released, and should be identified as an upgrade.
